IFF Global Artificial Intelligence Competitiveness Index Report

The IFF is an international, independent, non-profit organization founded in 2003 by G20 countries and international organizations. It aims to establish a platform for strategic dialogue, exchange, and cooperation in global finance, promoting sustainable development through academic research and talent cultivation.

Key Concepts:

  • Artificial Intelligence Competitiveness
  • International Finance Forum
  • Comprehensive and Sustainable Development
  • Global AI competition
  • Geographical distribution of AI companies
  • Competitive advantage
  • Historical accumulation in computer science
